name: Tai Chi, Meditation & Tea House ☯️🧘‍♀️🫖🍵
description:
A chillaxed flow for Sunday night : 

1/ ☯️ Tai Chi @Ding Hui 定慧 @Amber 卓玛 & @Tang Han

2/ 🧘‍♀️ Ideal Parent Figure Meditation @robknight 

3/ ✨ Science of Meditation Sharing @johnsonmx 

4/ 🫖 Tea @degerturan 

1-3 each for 30 min;

Rest of night would be just tea, chatting, and chill, leave some room for spaciousness towards the end 

2️⃣

We need a lot cushions and pillows and decided do it in a crowd sourcing way, so the more the better!
